GK19bahcar6u:19: jāte ca svapnāvaśeṣadarśane hṛdayāvaśeṣāvasthāne citrāvaśeṣākṛtau kāvyāvaśeṣanāmni naranāthe,
GK19bahcar6u:20: devo harṣaḥ kadācidutsṛṣṭavyāpāraḥ puñjībhūtavṛddhabandhuvargāgresareṇāvanatamūkamukhena mahājanena maulenākāla ātmānaṃ veṣṭyamānamadrākṣīt
GK19bahcar6u:25: yathādiśasi dvāri' iti śrutvā ca sodaryasnehanihitaniratiśayamanyumṛdūkṛtamanāḥ kathamapi na vavāma bāṣpavāripravāhotpīḍena saha jīvitam /
GK19bahcar6u:26: anantaraṃ ca dvārapālapramuktena prathamapraviṣṭena parijanenevākrandena kathyamānam,
GK19bahcar6u:33: avagatacūḍāmaṇini malinākulakuntale śekharaśūnye śirasi śūcamārūḍhāṃ mūrtimatīmiva dadhānam,
GK19bahcar6u:66: abhūmibhūtena kālakramopacayānāṃ śokena kavalīkṛtaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaramapaśyat /
GK19bahcar6u:67: āvegodgatakṛtsnasnehotkalikākalāpotkṣipya māṇakāya iva ca paravaśaḥ samudagāt /
GK19bahcar6u:68: atha taṃ dūrādeva dṛṣṭvā devo rājyavardhanaścirakālakalitaṃ bāṣpāvegaṃ mumukṣuḥ sudūraprasāritena
GK19bahcar6u:69: saṃkalpayanniva sarvaduḥkhāni dīrgheṇa dardaṇḍadvayena gṛhītvā kaṇṭhe muktakaṇṭhaṃ
GK19bahcar6u:71: kaṇṭhe punaḥ skandhabhāge punaḥ kapolodare nidhāya tathā tathā ruroda yathā saṃbandhanānīvodapāṭyanta hṛdayāni /
GK19bahcar6u:72: aśrusrotaḥśirā ivāmucyata locaneṣu lokenāsmṛtanṛpatinā rājavallabhenāpi pratiśabdakanibhena nirbharamivārudyata /
GK19bahcar6u:73: sucirācca kathaṃ kathamapi nirvṛṣṭanayanajalaḥ parjanya iva śaradi svayamevopaśaśāma /
GK19bahcar6u:79: tasyāṃ ca sthitvā vibhūṣaṃ vitrastavyastakuntalaṃ maulimanādarānniṣpīḍya sāvaśeṣamanyusphuritena
GK19bahcar6u:84: devo 'pi harṣastathaiva snātvā dharaṇitalanihitakuthāprasāritamūrtiradūra evāsya tūṣṇīmeva samavātiṣṭhata /
GK19bahcar6u:85: dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā dūyamānasamagrajanmānaṃ samasphuṭadivāsya sahasradhā hṛdayam /
GK19bahcar6u:87: lokasya tu narapatimaraṇadivasādapi dāruṇataraḥ sa babhūva divasaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:88: sarvasminneva ca nagare na kenacidapāci na kenacidasnāyi nābhoji /
GK19bahcar6u:93: savidhavirahavyādhividhuradhūbādhyamānaṃ babandha bandhāviva vibuddhabandhūkabhāsi bhāsvati sāsrāṃ dṛśaṃ cakravākacakravālam /
GK19bahcar6u:94: saṃcarantyāḥ samadhukararavaṃ kairavākaraṃ kalahaṃsaramaṇīramaṇīyaṃ māṇikyakāñjīkiṅkiṇījālamivācakāṇa śriyaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:96: asyāṃ ca velāyāmanatikramaṇīyavacanairupasṛtya pradhānasāmantairvi jñāpyamānaḥ kathaṃ kathamapyabhukta /
GK19bahcar6u:97: prabhātāyāṃ ca śarvaryāṃ sarveṣu praviṣṭeṣu rājasu samīpasthitaṃ hraṣadevamuvāca--“tāta/
GK19bahcar6u:99: śaiśava evāgrāhi guṇavatpatākeva bhavatā tātasya cittavṛttiḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:100: yato bhavantamevaṃ vidhaṃ vidheyaṃ vidhighidhānopanatanairghṛṇyamidaṃ kimapi bibhaṇiṣati me hṛdayam /
GK19bahcar6u:103: śṛṇu, na khalu na jānāsi lokavṛttam /
GK19bahcar6u:104: lokatrayatrātari māndhātari mṛte kiṃ na kṛtaṃ purukutsena?
GK19bahcar6u:108: tiṣṭhantu tāvatte tātenaiva śatasamadhikādhigatādhvaradhūmavisaradhūsaritavāsavavayasi sugṛhītanāmni tatrabhavati parāsutāṃ gate pitari kiṃ nākāri rājyam?
GK19bahcar6u:109: yaṃ ca kila śokaḥ smabhibhavati taṃ kāpuruṣamācakṣate śāstravidaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:112: svabhāvasya seyaṃ kāpuruṣatā vā straiṇaṃ vā yadevamāspadaṃ pitṛśokahutabhujo jāto 'smi /
GK19bahcar6u:113: mama hi bhūbhṛti paryaste niravaśeṣataḥ prasravaṇānīva srutānyaśrūṇyastamite mahati tejasyandhakārībhūtadaśāśasya pranaṣṭaḥ prajñālokaḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:117: pade pade digdharopāhateva hariṇī muhyati matiḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:118: puruṣadveṣiṇīva dūrata eva bhramati pariharantī spṛtiḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:125: tāto hutāśanatāmeva kevalāmāpanno 'pi naivaṃ dahati mām /
GK19bahcar6u:126: antastadevamidamasāṃparāyikamiva hṛdayamavaṣṭabhya vyutthitaḥ śokau durnivāro vāḍava iva vārirāśim,
GK19bahcar6u:130: dahati dārayati tanūkaroti kavalayati ca mām /
GK19bahcar6u:131: kāmaṃ na śaknoti me hṛdayaṃ tādṛśasya samerukalpasya kalpamahāpuruṣasya vinipātamaśrubindubhireva kevalairativāhayitum /
GK19bahcar6u:132: rājye viṣa iva cakorasya me viraktaṃ cakṣuḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:133: bahumṛtapaṭāvaguṇṭhanāṃ rañjitaraṅgāṃ janaṅgamānāmiva vaṃśavāhyāmanāryāṃ śriyaṃ tyaktumabhilaṣati me manaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:134: kṣaṇamapi dagdhagṛhe śakuniriva na pārayāmi thātum /
GK19bahcar6u:135: so 'hamicchāmi manasi vāsasīva sulagnaṃ snehamalamidamamalaiḥ śikhariśikharaprasravaṇaiḥ svacchasro tombubhiḥ prakṣālayitumāśramapade /
GK19bahcar6u:139: ityabhidhāya ca khaḍgagrāhiṇo hastādādāya nijaṃ nistriṃśamutsasarja dharaṇyām /
GK19bahcar6u:140: atha tacchru tvā niśitaśikhena śūlenevāhataḥ pravidīrṇahṛdayo devo harṣaḥ samacintayat--“kiṃ nu khalu māmantareṇāryaḥ kenacidasahiṣṇunā kiñcidgrāhitaḥ kupitaḥ syāt /
GK19bahcar6u:149: athavā tātavināśaniḥśaṅkakalikālakrīḍitaṃ yenāyaṃ yaḥ kaścidiva yatkiñcanakāriṇaṃ māmapuṣyabhūtivaṃśasaṃbhūtamiva,
GK19bahcar6u:157: tadetattāvadanurūpaṃ yacchauryonmādamadironmattasamastasāmantamaṇḍalasamudramathanamandare tādṛśi pitari mṛte tapovanaṃ vā gamyate valkalāni vā gṛhyante tapāṃsi vā sevyante /
GK19bahcar6u:158: yā tu mayi rājājñā sā dagdho 'pi dāhakāriṇī mayyavagrahaglapite dhanvanīvāṅgāravṛṣṭiḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:178: ko hi nāma tadvidhe nipatite rājagandhakuñjare janayitari cedṛśe viphalīkṛtaviśālaśilāstambhorubhuje
GK19bahcar6u:179: bhūbhuji bhrātari tyaktarājye jyāyasi navavayasi tapovanaṃ gacchati sakalalokalocanajalapātāpavitraṃ
GK19bahcar6u:184: kiṃ vāsya cetasaścyutaḥ saumitrirvismṛtā vā vṛkodaraprabhṛtayaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:186: api cārye tapovanaṃ gate jijīvaṣuḥ ko manasāpi mahīṃ dhyāyet /
GK19bahcar6u:188: kesariṇi vanavihārāya vinirgate nivāsa giriguhāṃ kaḥ pāti pṛṣṭhataḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:190: kaścapalāṃ rājalakṣmīṃ pratyanurodho 'yamāryasya yadiyamapi na cīvarāntaritakucā kuśakusumasamitpalāśapūlikāṃ vahantī tatraiva tapovane vanamṛgīva nīyate jarājālinī /
GK19bahcar6u:191: kiṃvā mamānena vṛthā bahudhā bikalpitena tūṣṇīmevāryamanugamiṣyāmi /
GK19bahcar6u:194: atrāntare pūrvādiṣṭenaiva rudatā vastrakarmāntikena samupasthāpiteṣu valkaleṣu,
GK19bahcar6u:208: sabālavṛddhāsu tapovanāya prasthitāsu sarvāsu prajāsu sahasaiva praviśya śokaviklavaḥ
GK19bahcar6u:209: prakṣaritanayanasalilo rājyaśriyaḥ paricārakaḥ saṃvādako nāma prajñātatamo vimuktākrandaḥ
GK19bahcar6u:211: atha saṃbhrānto bhrātrā saha svayaṃ devo rājyavardhanastaṃ paryapṛcchat-“bhadra/
GK19bahcar6u:216: piśācānāmiva nīcātmanāṃ caritāni chidraprahārīṇi prāyaśo bhavanti /
GK19bahcar6u:217: yato yasminnahanyavaniṃpatiruparata ityabhūdvārtā tasminneva devo grahavarmā durātmanā mālavarājena jīvalokamātmānaḥ sukṛtena saha tyājitaḥ
GK19bahcar6u:218: bhartṛdārikāpi rājyaśrīḥ kālāyasanigaḍayugalacumbitacaraṇā caurāṅganeva saṃyatā kānyakubje kārāyāṃ nikṣiptā /
GK19bahcar6u:219: kiṃvadantī ca yathā kilānāyakaṃ sādhanaṃ matvā jighṛkṣuḥ sudurmatiretāmapi bhuvamājigamiṣati /
GK19bahcar6u:225: kṛpābhūmibhūtāyāśca svasuḥ snehātsa tādṛśo 'pi baddhamūlo 'pyatyantagururekapada evāsya nanāsya nanāśa śokāvegaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:226: viveśa ca sahasā kesarīva giriguhāgṛhaṃ gabhīrahṛdayaṃ bhayaṅkaraḥ kopāvegaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:227: keśiniṣūdanaśaṅkākulakāliyabhaṅgurabhrūbhaṅgataraṅgiṇī śyāmāyamānā yamasvaseva prathīyasī lalāṭapaṭṭe bhīṣaṇā bhrukuṭirudabhidyata /
GK19bahcar6u:228: darpātparāmṛśannakhakiraṇasalilanirjharaiḥ samarabhārasaṃbhāvanābhiṣekamiva cakāra diṅnāgakumbhakūṭavikaṭasya bāhuśikharakośasya vāmaḥ pāṇipallavaḥ
GK19bahcar6u:229: saṃgalatsvedasalilapūritodaro nirmūlaṃ mālavonmūlanāya gṛhītakeśa iva durmadaśrīkacagrahotkaṇṭhayeva ca kampamānaḥ punarapi samutsasarpa bhīṣaṇaṃ kṛpāṇaṃ pāṇiraparaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:232: niṣṭhurāṅguṣṭakaṣaṇaniṣṭhyūtadhūtadhūmalekho nirvīrorvīkaraṇāya vimuktaśikha iva lilekha maṇikuṭṭimamitaraḥ pādapajhaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:249: tiṣṭhantu sarva eva rājānaḥ kariṇaśca tvayaiva sārdham /
GK19bahcar6u:253: nirvartanādeśena dūraprarūḍhapraṇayapīḍa iva provāca devo harṣaḥ--“kimiva hi doṣaṃ
GK19bahcar6u:255: yadi bāla iti nitarāṃ tarhi na parityājyo 'smi /
GK19bahcar6u:265: na bāhyaḥ sahāyo mahata iti vyatiriktameva māṃ gaṇayati,
GK19bahcar6u:269: kā ceyamātmaṃbharitā bhujasya te yadekākī kṣīrodaphenapaṭalapāṇḍuramamṛtamiva yaśaḥ pipāsati /
GK19bahcar6u:277: api ca tavāṣṭādaśadvīpāṣṭamaṅgalakamālinī medinyastyeva vikramasya viṣayaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:279: na sumeruvaprapraṇayapragalbhā vā divkariṇaḥ pariṇamantyaṇīyasi valmīke /
GK19bahcar6u:280: grahīṣyasi sakalapṛthvīpatipralayotpātamahādhūmaketuṃ māndhāteva cārucāmīkarapahkapatralatālaṅkārāṅkakāyaṃ kārmukaṃ kakubhāṃ vijaye /
GK19bahcar6u:281: mama tu durnivārāyāmasyāṃ vipakṣakṣapaṇakṣudhi kṣubhitāyāṃ kṣamyatāmayamekākinaḥ kopakavala ekaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:289: svayūthabhraṣṭa iva vanyaḥ karī devo harṣaḥ kathaṃ kathamapyekākī kālaṃ tamanaiṣīt /
GK19bahcar6u:290: atikrānteṣu bahuṣu vāsareṣu kadācittayaiva bhrātṛgamanaduḥkhāsikayā dattaprajāgarasibhāgaśeṣāyāṃ triyāmāyāṃ yāmikena sīyamānāmimāmāryāṃ śuśrāva--
GK19bahcar6u:292: potaṃ pavana iva vidhiḥ puruṣamakāṇḍe nipātayati // 6.3 //
GK19bahcar6u:293: tāṃ ca śrutvā sutarāmanityatābhāvanayā dūyamānahṛdayaḥ prakṣīṇabhūyiṣṭhāyāṃ kṣapāyāṃ kṣaṇamiva nidrāmalabhata /
GK19bahcar6u:300: pratyahaṃ rāhuravikalakāyabandha iva kabandhavati bradhnabimbe ghaṭamāno vibhāvyate /
GK19bahcar6u:302: dine dine dāruṇā diśāṃ dāhā dṛśyante /
GK19bahcar6u:305: niśi niśi itastataḥ prajvalitābhirulkābhirugraṃ grahayuddhamiva viyati vilokayanti vilolatārakāḥ kakubhaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:308: asminnasmadvaṃśe kariṇa iva karīraṃ komalamapi kalayataḥ kṛtāntasya kaḥ paripanthī?
GK19bahcar6u:310: iti cintayitvā ca antarbhinnaṃ bhrātṛsnehakātaraṃ dravadiva hṛdayaṃ kathaṃ kathamapi saṃstabhyotthāya yathākriyamāṇaṃ kriyākalāpamakarot /
GK19bahcar6u:316: duḥkhadūraprarūḍharomṇā mūkenāpi mukhena svāmivyasanamavicchinnairaśrubindubhirvijñāpayantaṃ kuntalaṃ nāma bṛhadaśvavāram,
GK19bahcar6u:322: tasmācca helānirjitamālavānīkamapi gauḍādhipena mithyopacāropacitaviśvāsaṃ muktaśastramekākinaṃ viśrabdhaṃ svabhavana eva bhrātaraṃ vyāpāditamaśrauṣīt
GK19bahcar6u:335: parīkṣita iva sarvabhogidahanodyataḥ vṛkodara iva ripurudhiratṛṣitaḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:345: avādīcca gauḍādhipādhamamapahāya kastādṛśaṃ mahāpuruṣa tatkṣaṇa ve nirvyājabhūjavīryanirjitasamastarājakaṃ
GK19bahcar6u:346: muktaśastraṃ kalaśayonimiva kṛṣṇavartmaprasūtirīdṛśena sarvavīralokavimarditena mṛtyunā śamayedevamāryam /
GK19bahcar6u:347: anāryaṃ ca taṃ muktvā bhāgīrathīphenapaṭalapāṇḍurāḥ keṣāṃ manaḥsu saraḥsu rājahaṃsā iva paraśurāmaparākramasmṛtikṛto na kuryurāryaśauryagṛṇāḥ pakṣapātam /
GK19bahcar6u:353: nāmāpi ca gṛhṇato 'sya pāpakāriṇaḥ pāpamalena lipyata iva me jihvā /
GK19bahcar6u:354: kiṃ vāṅgīkṛtya kāryamāryastena kṣudreṇānupraviśya vigataghṛṇena ghuṇeneva sakalabhuvanāhlādanacaturaścandanastambhaḥ kṣayamupanītaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:355: nūnaṃ nānena mūḍhena madhurasāsvādalubdhena madhvivāryajīvitamākarṣatā bhāvī dṛṣṭaḥ śilīmukhasaṃpātopadravaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:356: nijagṛhadūṣaṇaṃ jālamārgapradīpakena kajjalamivātimalinaṃ kevalamayaśaḥ saṃcitaṃ gauḍādhamena /
GK19bahcar6u:357: ntavāśvevāstamupagatavatyapi tribhuvanacūḍāmaṇau savitari vedhasādiṣṭaḥ satpathaśatrorandhakārasya nigrahāya grahaṣaṇḍavihāraikahariṇādhipaḥ śaśī /
GK19bahcar6u:358: vinayavidhāyini bhagne 'pi cāṅkuśe vidyata eva vyālavāraṇasya vinayāya sakalamattamātaṅgakumbhasthalasthiraśirobhāgabhiduraḥ khalataraḥ kesarinakharaḥ
GK19bahcar6u:359: tādṛśāḥ kuvaikaṭikā iva tejasviratnavināśakāḥ kasya na vadhyāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:361: ' ityevamabhidadhata evāsya piturapi mitraṃ senāpatiḥ samagravigrahaprāgraharo haritālaśailāvadātadehaḥ pariṇatapraguṇasālaprakāṇḍaprakāśaḥ
GK19bahcar6u:365: kathamapi sāramayeṣu śiroruheṣu śaśikaranikarasitasaralaśiroruhasaṭālāṃ saiṃhīmiva niṣkapaṭaparākramarasaracitāṃ saṃkrānto jīvannevajātim,
GK19bahcar6u:367: dhavalasthūlaguñjāpicchapracchāditakapolabhāgabhāsvareṇa vamanniva vikramakālamakāle 'pi vikāśikāśakānanaviśadaṃ śaradārambhaṃ bhīmena mukhena,
GK19bahcar6u:368: mṛtamapi hṛdayasthitaṃ svāminamiva sitacāmareṇa vījayannābhilambena kūrcakalāpena,
GK19bahcar6u:395: saṃnidhāvevasamupaviṣṭaḥ siṃhanādanāmā svareṇaiva dundubhighoṣagambhīreṇa subhaṭānāṃ samararasamānayanvijñāpitavān--
GK19bahcar6u:396: “deva/ na vkacitkṛtāśrayayā malinayā malinatarāḥ kokilayā kākā iva kāpuruṣā hatalakṣmyā vipralabhyamānamātmānaṃ na cetayante /
GK19bahcar6u:397: śriyo hi doṣā andhatādayaḥ kāmalā vikārāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:399: kiṃ vā karotu varākaḥ yanātibhīrutayā nityaparāṅmukhena natu dṛṣṭānyeva sarvātiśāyiśauryātiśayaśvayathukapilakapolapulakapallavitakopānalāni kupitānāṃ tejasvināṃ mukhāni /
GK19bahcar6u:400: nāsau tapasvī jānātyevaṃ yathābhicārā iva viprakṛtāḥ sadyaḥ sakalakulapralayamupāharanti manasvina iti /
GK19bahcar6u:403: manasvināṃ hi pradhanapradhānadhane dhanuṣi dhriyamāṇe sati ca kamalākalahaṃsīkelikuvalayakānane kṛpāṇe kṛpaṇopāyāḥ payodhimathanaprabhṛtayo 'pi śrīmamatthānasya kiṃ punarīdṛśāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:404: yeṣāṃ ca dhātrā dharitrīṃ trātuṃ niyuktāḥ svayamasamarthā iva kulaśakarkaśabhujaparighapraharaṇahetorudgiranti
GK19bahcar6u:405: girayo 'pi lohāni te kathamiva bāhuśālino manasāpi vimalayaśobhāndhavā dhyāyeyurakāryam /
GK19bahcar6u:406: sarvagrahābhibhavabhāsvarāṇāṃ hi subhaṭakarāṇāmagrato diggrahaṇe paṅgavaḥ pataṅgakarāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:407: mahāmahiṣaśṛṅgataraṅgabhaṅgabhahgurabhīṣaṇāntarālā lokapravādamātreṇa ca dakṣiṇāśā paramārthato bhaṭamrukuṭiradhivāso yamasya /
GK19bahcar6u:408: citraṃ ca yadunmuktasiṃhanādānāṃ sahasā sāhasarabhasarasaromāñcakaṇṭakanikareṇa saha na niryānti saṭāḥ śūrāṇāṃ raṇeṣu /
GK19bahcar6u:409: dvayameva ca catuḥsāgarasaṃbhṛtasya bhūtisaṃbhārasya bājanaṃ pratipakṣadāhi dāruṇaṃ vaḍavāmukhaṃ vā mahāpuruṣahṛdayaṃ vā /
GK19bahcar6u:411: vṛthāvitatavipulaphaṇābhāro bhujahgānāṃ bhartā bibharti yo bhogena mṛtpiṇḍameva kevalam /
GK19bahcar6u:412: apratihataśāsanākrāntyupabhogasukharasaṃ tu rasāyāṃ dikkuñjarabhārabhāsvaraprakoṣṭhā vīrabāhava eva jānanti /
GK19bahcar6u:414: kātarasya tu śaśina iva hariṇahṛdayasya pāṇḍurapṛṣṭhasya suto dvirātramapi niścalā lakṣmīḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:428: na ca svapnadṛṣṭanaṣṭeṣviva kṣaṇikeṣu śarīreṣu nibadhnanti bandhubuddhiṃ prabuddhāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:430: anavarataprajvalitatejaḥprasarabhāsvarasvabhāvaṃ ca maṇipradopamiva kaluṣaḥ kajjalamalo na spṛśatyevātitejasvinaṃ śokaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:431: satvaṃ sattvavatāmagraṇīḥ prāgraharaḥ prājñānāṃ prathamaḥ samarthānāṃ praṣṭho 'bhijātānāmagresarastejasvināmādirasahiṣṇūnām /
GK19bahcar6u:432: etāśca satatasaṃnihitadhūmāyamānakopāgnayaḥ sulabhāsidhārātoyatṛptayo vikaṭabāhuvanacchāyopagūḍhā dhīratāyā nivāsaśiśirabhūmayaḥ svāyattāḥ subhaṭānāmuraḥkavāṭabhittayaḥ
GK19bahcar6u:434: tathā kuru yathā nānyo 'pi kaścidācaratyevaṃ bhūyaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:446: yenaiva ca te gataḥ pitā pitāmahaḥ prapitāmaho vā tameva mā hāsīstribhuvanaspṛhaṇīyaṃ panthānam /
GK19bahcar6u:447: avahāya kupuruṣocitāṃ śucaṃ pratipadyasva kulakramāgatāṃ kesarīva kuraṅgīṃ rājalakṣmīm /
GK19bahcar6u:448: deva/ devabhūyaṃ gate narendre duṣṭagauḍabhujaṅgajagdhajīvite ca rājyavardhane vṛtte 'sminmahāpralaye dharaṇīdhāraṇāyādhunā tvaṃ śeṣaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:450: kṣmāpatīnāṃ śiraḥsu śaratsaviteva lalāṭantapān prayaccha pādanyāsān /
GK19bahcar6u:452: api ca hate pitaryekākī tapasvī mṛgaiḥ saha saṃvardhitaḥ sahajabrāhnaṇyamārdavasukumāramanāḥ
GK19bahcar6u:457: na hyayamarātiraktacandanacarcāśiśiropacāramantareṇa sāmyati paribhavānalapacyamānadehasya devasya duḥkhadāhajvara sudāruṇaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:463: itarathā hi me gṛhītabhuvi bhogināthe 'pi dāyādadṛṣṭirīrṣyālorbhujasya /
GK19bahcar6u:465: upari gacchatīcchati nigrahāya grahagaṇe 'pi bhrūlatā calitum /
GK19bahcar6u:470: kiṃ punarīdṛśe durjāte jāte jātāmarṣanirbhare ca manasi nāstyevāvakāśaḥ sokakriyākaraṇasya?
GK19bahcar6u:471: api ca hṛdayaviṣamaśalye musalye jīvati jālme jagadvigahite gauḍādhipādhamacaṇḍāle jihremi śuṣkādharapuṭaḥ pījeva pratikāraśūnyaṃ śucā śūtkartum
GK19bahcar6u:477: nirgauḍaṃ gāṃ na karomi tatastanūnapāti pītasarpiṣi pataṅga iva pātakī pātayāmyātmānam'
GK19bahcar6u:483: ā guhyakagehinīparimalasugandhigandhapāṣāṇavāsitaguhāgṛhācca gandhamādanāt sarveṣāṃ rājñāṃ sajjīkriyantāṃ karāḥ karadānāya śastragrahaṇāya vā,
GK19bahcar6u:493: paṅgoriva mekuto nivṛttistāvadyāvanna kṛtaḥ sarvadvīpāntarasaṃcārī sakalanarapatimukuṭamaṇiśilālokamayaḥ pādalepaḥ' /
GK19bahcar6u:494: iti kṛtaniścayaśca muktāsthāno visarjitarājalokaḥ snānārambhākāṅkṣī sabhāmatyākṣīt /
GK19bahcar6u:496: agalacca darpaprasara iva śrutapratijñasya śāmyadūṣmā divasastribhuvanasya /
GK19bahcar6u:497: tataśca nijādhikārāpahārabhīta iva bhagavatyapi vkāpi gate gatatejasyahimabhāsi,
GK19bahcar6u:500: bhuvanavyāpinīṃ sandhyāṃ pratijñāmiva mānayati nataśirasi ghaṭitāñjalivane jane sakale,
GK19bahcar6u:501: svapadacyuticakitadikpāladīyamānābhralihalohaprākāravalayakalitāsvi va bahalatimiramālātiraudhīyamānāsu dikṣu pradoṣāsthāne nāticiraṃ tasthau
GK19bahcar6u:502: namannṛpalokalolāṃśukapavanakampitaśikhairdīpikācakravālairapi praṇamyamāna iva prāhiṇollokaṃ pratiṣiddhaparijanapraveśaśca śayanagṛhaṃ prāviśat
GK19bahcar6u:504: dīpadvitīyaṃ ca tamabhisara iva labdhāvasarastarasā bhrātṛśoko jagrāha /
GK19bahcar6u:511: kathaṃ cāsya me hatahṛdayasyāryavirahe sakṛdapi yuktaṃ samacchvasitum /
GK19bahcar6u:516: dagdharoṣāntaritaśucā suciraṃ ruditamapi na muktakaṇṭhaṃ gataghṛṇena mayā /
GK19bahcar6u:518: lokayātrāmātranibandhanā bāndhavatā yatrāhamapi nāma para ivārye svargasthe svastha ivāse /
GK19bahcar6u:519: daivahatakena phalamāsāditamīdṛśi parasparaprītibandhanirvṛtahṛdaye sukhabhāji bhrātṛmithune vighaṭite /
GK19bahcar6u:520: tathā ca candramayā iva jagadāhlādino lokāntarībhūtasya lagnacitāgnaya ivāryasya ta eva dahanti guṇāḥ ityetāni cānyāni ca hṛdayena paryadevata
GK19bahcar6u:521: prabhātāyāṃ ca śarvaryāṃ pratīhāramādideśāśeṣagajasādhanādhikṛtaṃ skandaguptaṃ draṣṭumicchāmīti /
GK19bahcar6u:546: atisnigdhamadhuradhavalaviśālatayā pītakṣīrodeneva pibannīkṣaṇayugmāyāmena diśāmāyāmaṃ merutaṭādapi vikaṭavipulālikaḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:550: ātmasthasamastamattamātaṅgasādhano 'pyaspṛṣṭo madena bhūtimānapi snehamayaḥ pārthivo 'pi guṇamayaḥ kariṇāmiva dānavatāmupari sthitaḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:557: upaviṣṭaṃ ca nātinikaṭe taṃ tadā jagāda devo harṣaḥ--
GK19bahcar6u:561: ityevamabhihitaśca pramamya vyajñāpayat--“kṛtamavadhārayatu svāmī samādiṣṭaṃ kitu svalpaṃ vijñapyamasti bhartṛbhakteḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:563: devena hi puṣyabhūtivaṃśasaṃbhūtasyābhijanasyābijātyasya sahajasya tejasodikkarikarapralambasya bāhuyugalasyāsādhāraṇasya ca sodarasnehasya sarvaṃ sadṛśamupakrāntam /
GK19bahcar6u:564: kākodarābidhānāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ kṛmayo 'pi na mṛṣyanti nikāraṃ kimuta bhavādṛśāstejasāṃ rāśayaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:565: kevalaṃ devarājyavardhanodantena kiyadapi dṛṣṭameva devena durjanadaurātmyam /
GK19bahcar6u:566: ridṛśāḥ khalu lokasvabhāvāḥ pratigrāmaṃ pratinagaraṃ pratideśaṃ pratidvīpaṃ pratidiśaṃ ca bhinnā veśāścākārāścāhārāśca vyāhārāśca vyavahārāśca janapadānām /
GK19bahcar6u:572: cūḍāmaṇilagnalekhapratibimbavācitākṣarā ca cārucāmokaracāmaragrāhiṇī yamatāṃ yayau yavaneśvarasya /
GK19bahcar6u:573: lobhabahulaṃ ca bahulaniśi nidhānamutkhanantamutkhātakhaḍgapramāthinī mamantha māthuraṃ bṛhadrathaṃ vidūrathavarūthinī /
GK19bahcar6u:574: nāgavanavihāraśīlaṃ ca māyāmātaṅgāṅgānnirgatā mahāsenasainikā vatsapatiṃ nyayaṃsiṣuḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:575: atidayitalāsyasya ca śailūṣamadyamadhyāsya mūrdhānamasilatayā mṛṇālamivālunādagnimitrātmajasya sumitrasya mitradevaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:578: senānīranāryo mauryaṃ bṛhadrathaṃ pipeṣa puṣyamitraḥ svāminam /
GK19bahcar6u:579: āścaryakutūhalī ca daṇḍopanatayavananirmitena nabhastalayāyinā yantrayānenānīyata vkāpi kākavarṇaḥ śaiśunāgiśca nagaropakaṇṭhe kaṇṭhe nicakṛte nistriṃśena /
GK19bahcar6u:580: atistrīsaṅgaratamanaṅgaparavasaṃ śuṅgamamātyo vasudevo devabhūtidāsīduhitrā devīvyañjanayā vītajīvitamakārayat /
GK19bahcar6u:583: mahākālamahe ca manāmāṃsavikrayavādavātūlaṃ vetālastālajaṅgho jaghāna jaghanyajaṃ pradyotasya pauṇakiṃ kumāraṃ kumārasenam /
GK19bahcar6u:585: strīviśvāsinasca mahādevīgṛhagūḍhabhittibhāgbhūtvā bhrātā bhadrasenasyābhavanmṛtyave kāliṅgasya vīrasenaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:587: utsārakaruciṃ carahasi sasacivameva dūrīcakāra cakoranāthaṃ śūdrakadūtaścandraketuṃ jīvitāt /
GK19bahcar6u:588: mṛgayāsaktasya ca mathnato gaṇḍakānuddaṇḍanaḍvalanalavananilīnāsca campādhipacamūcarabhaṭāscāmuṇḍīpaterācemuḥ prāṇān puṣkarasya /
GK19bahcar6u:589: bandirāgaparaṃ ca paraprayuktā jayaśabdamukharamukhā maṅkhā maukhariṃ mūrkhaṃ kṣatravarmāṇamudakhanan /
GK19bahcar6u:590: aripure ca parakalatrakāmukaṃ kāminīveśaguptaśca candraguptaḥ śakapatimaśātayaditi /
GK19bahcar6u:591: pramattānāṃ ca pramadākṛtā api pramādāḥ śrutiviṣayamāgatā eva devasya /
GK19bahcar6u:592: yathā madhumoditaṃ madhurakasaṃliptairlājaiḥ suprabhā putrarājyārthaṃ mahāsena kāśirājaṃ jaghāna /
GK19bahcar6u:593: vyājajanitakandarpadarpā ca darpaṇena kṣuradhārāparyantenāyodhyādhipatiṃ parantapaṃ ratnavatī jārūthyam,
GK19bahcar6u:594: viṣacūrṇacumbitamakarandena ca karṇendīvareṇa devakī devarānuruktā devasenaṃ sauhnyam,
GK19bahcar6u:595: yogaparāgavirasavarṣiṇā ca maṇinūpureṇa vallabhā sapatnīruṣā vairantyaṃ rantidevam,
GK19bahcar6u:596: veṇīvinigūḍhena ca śastreṇa bindumatīṃ vṛṣṇiṃ vindūratham,
GK19bahcar6u:597: rasadigdhamadyena ca mekhalāmaṇinā hasavatī sauvīraṃ vorasenam,
GK19bahcar6u:598: adṛśyāgadaviliptavadanā ca viṣavāruṇīgaṇḍūṣapāyanena pauravī pauraveśvaraṃ somakam' /
GK19bahcar6u:601: tataśca tathā kṛtapratijñe prayāṇaṃ vijayāya diśāṃ samādiśati deve harṣe gatāyuṣāṃ pratisāmantānāmudavasiteṣu bahurūpāṇyupaliṅgāni vitenire
GK19bahcar6u:604: ciraṃ vivṛtavikṛtavadanaviva raviniḥsṛtavahnivisarā vāsare 'pi virasaṃ viresuściramaśivārthamaśivāḥ śivāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:613: samāghrātayamamahiṣagandhā iva tāmyantaḥ stambakarimapi harayo haritaṃ navayavasaṃ na ceruḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:620: vadhyālaṅkāraraktacandanarasacchaṭā ivālakṣyanta śūrāṇāṃ patitāḥ śarīreṣu vikasitabandhūkakusumaśoṇitaśociṣaḥ śoṇitavṛṣṭayaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:621: paryagnīkurvāṇā iva vinaśvarīṃ śriyamaviralasphuratsphuliṅgāhgārodgāradagdhatārāgaṇā gaṇaśaḥ patantaḥ prajvalanto na vyaraṃsiṣurulkādaṇḍāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:622: prathamameva pratihārīvāpaharantī pratibhavanaṃ cāmarātapatravyajanāni paruṣā babhrāma vātyeti /
GK19bahcar6u:623: iti śrībāṇamaṭṭakṛtau harṣacarite rājapratijñāvarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭha ucchvāsaḥ/
